Value of jobs on PO & Number Items

rules.name: Is_this_Mixed_Waste_Type_Job
rules.label: Is this Mixed Waste Type Job?

Flow.description: 02-07-2025 : Is_RLCS__c = true for schedule 24-06-2025 : added schedule functionality 24-06-2025 : added mixed waste jobs 13-06-2025: added Transport per Unit mapping 10-06-2025 : removed aatf date mapping 20-03-2025 : added Notes on Supplier PO input 03-03-2025 : added Manage Booking Confirmation Email Subflow 03-03-2025 : do not send supplier email when Pricing Method = Fixed 03-03-2025 : added Haulier = Supplier in Fixed Job 25-02-2025 : added Haulier templates 21-02-2025 : added Transport_Per_Tonne__c mapping 18-02-2025 : fixed redirect issue 18-02-2025 : added supplier email 17-02-2025 : redirect to rlcs job 10-02-2025 : added Delivery Date as AATF Received Date 16-01-2025 : added Delivery and Collection Slot 15-01-2025 : added Sited Container and Wait & Load 05-01-2024 : added AATFs <-- OrderItem.Depot Dispose 05-12-2024 : added Processor__c <-- OrderItem.Partner__c (Supplier name) 18-1-2024 : added sales tonnage inc and partner tonnage inc 15-11-2024: added other mapping on the job for job charges 15-11-2024: added Haulier mapping 15-11-2024: removed unnecessary stuff from the flow for RLCS Job

formulas.name: templateName
formulas.expression:
IF(TEXT({!ordProductObj.Pricing_method__c}) == "Fixed",
CASE({!jobType}, "Exchange", "RLCS_Fixed_Job_Template_Exchange", "Wait & Load", "RLCS_Fixed_Job_Template_Wait_Load", "RLCS_Fixed_Job_Template_Delivery") , IF(TEXT({!ordProductObj.Pricing_method__c}) =="Variable",
CASE({!jobType}, "Exchange", "RLCS_Variable_Job_Template_Exchange", "Wait & Load", "RLCS_Variable_Job_Template_Wait_Load", "RLCS_Variable_Job_Template_Delivery")
, IF(TEXT({!ordProductObj.Pricing_method__c}) == "Rebate",
CASE({!jobType}, "Exchange", "RLCS_Rebate_Job_Template_Exchange", "Wait & Load", "RLCS_Rebate_Job_Template_Wait_Load", "RLCS_Rebate_Job_Template_Delivery")
, "No Template Found")))

formulas.name: templateNameProcessor
formulas.expression:
IF(TEXT({!ordProductObj.Pricing_method__c}) == "Fixed",
CASE({!jobType}, "Exchange", "RLCS_Fixed_Job_Template_Exchange_P", "Wait & Load", "RLCS_Fixed_Job_Template_Wait_Load_P", "RLCS_Fixed_Job_Template_Delivery_P") , IF(TEXT({!ordProductObj.Pricing_method__c}) =="Variable",
CASE({!jobType}, "Exchange", "RLCS_Variable_Job_Template_Exchange_P", "Wait & Load", "RLCS_Variable_Job_Template_Wait_Load_P", "RLCS_Variable_Job_Template_Delivery_P")
, IF(TEXT({!ordProductObj.Pricing_method__c}) == "Rebate",
CASE({!jobType}, "Exchange", "RLCS_Rebate_Job_Template_Exchange_P", "Wait & Load", "RLCS_Rebate_Job_Template_Wait_Load_P", "RLCS_Rebate_Job_Template_Delivery_P")
, "No Template Found")))
